trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
A ListViewItem is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: 列表视图项是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.

A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> typically specifies the content for its ListViewItem controls by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>通常通过设置，指定其 ListViewItem 控件的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>属性或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Templates and styles that are defined for the ListViewItem type are used to specify the display of the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 模板和列表视图项类型定义的样式用于在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>指定内容的显示

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListViewItem Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ListViewItem controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ListViewItem 控件到自定义适用于多个列表视图项控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ListViewItem, see [ListView Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于列表视图项的状态，请参阅[ListView 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。
有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ListViewItem control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 ListViewItem 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> class.
